pr_title: Added module-info.java and removed javax.annotation from RntbdMetrics

timeline.message: Added module-info.java and removed javax.annotation from RntbdMetrics
added java logging module because of guava

timeline.author: srnagar

timeline.bodyText: Don't need any of these as you are requiring com.azure.core which transitively requires these.
timeline.author: srnagar

timeline.bodyText: @kushagraThapar We shouldn't be using this version of log4j. This particular version went out of support in 2015 and @conniey had updated these dependencies in early Feb as part of this PR. I would like to see this cosmos specific version updated to use the 2.x common versions above.
timeline.author: JimSuplizio

replies.bodyText:
@JimSuplizio  - the only reason we had to add log4j is because of this dependency.
<dependency>
      <groupId>com.fasterxml.uuid</groupId>
      <artifactId>java-uuid-generator</artifactId>
      <version>3.2.0</version> <!-- {x-version-update;com.fasterxml.uuid:java-uuid-generator;external_dependency} -->
    </dependency>

Cosmos doesn't use this dependency of log4j, but uuid does, and it was complaining for log4j module not found, required by com.fasterxml.uuid
So that is the reason we had to add this.
replies.author: kushagraThapar

replies.bodyText:
Is it possible to move to version 4? It uses slf4j, which would align with our underlying logging framework.
https://github.com/cowtowncoder/java-uuid-generator/blob/master/README.md#dependencies
replies.author: conniey

replies.bodyText: @conniey yes that should be possible, I will give it a shot.
replies.author: kushagraThapar
